frameset.edef: to react in a positive way

example.parse: (S (NP-SBJ (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_PL+CASE_DEF_NOM انتخابات) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN المتن))) (NP-PRD (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_INDEF_NOM رسالة)) (SBAR (WHNP (-NONE- 0)) (S (PP-PRD (PREP على) (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN السلطة))) (SBAR-SBJ (SUB_CONJ أن) (S (VP (IV3FS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:S تتجاوب) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (NP-ADV (NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC مع) (NP (NP (PRON_3FS ها)) (NP (-NONE- *T*))))))))))))

frameset.edef: to harmonize with / be in accord with

example.parse: (S (NP-TPC-1 (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_NOM درْسُ) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الحقوق))) (PP (PREP في) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN المجتمع) (DET+ADJ+CASE_DEF_GEN الروماني)))) (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MS تجاوب) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (NP-ADV (NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC مع) (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_PL+CASE_DEF_GEN طموحات) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN ابنائ) (NP (POSS_PRON_3MS ه)))))))))

arg.g: with the ambitions of his children
